body:
Hello everyone, I reinstalled my OpenFoam and VM recently and from then the following errors started popping up with every CFD I run. The errors are: Error1 1. Solution exception:Failed to find points file at C:\Users\Neeharika\butterfly\outdoor_airflow\constant\polyMesh Error2 1. Solution exception:Failed to load values:
Failed to find probes folder folder at C:\Users\Neeharika\butterfly\outdoor_airflow\postProcessing\probes [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/M-kC1yhXlFIrTwPqJUdRsv54BBSzwVkuXReFqsQc4WR1g7E9*-JNyB3BUybtNLGxHds*75S-PjCJslbLE4YI3oJiICe7tgcb/ButterflyError2.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/M-kC1yhXlFJJDZlh3T*3wHmzljC*e-M6wtOrdnTw0o0XTCDbjM5-2enXGEBRX*YTt5MMdoym-H*cA**cS30L7uRo88bRgWz-/ButterflyError.jpg)
Any suggestions how can I overcome this error Thank you

replies.body: Neeharika, The folder runs with no issues on my machine. There is an issue with you installation. Follow these lines in the command line and tell me what happens. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/qqgeSDS7OBfmvIjqRBlWOcNXiOFGMo0n3UIrYeo9PPx*hHjwI992hm0xL4S2IYMYO6YSb-d6QXVvo633GDHdl8NUuMkKzFjt/openfoam_commandline.png)

Mostapha, I did enter the first command "cd workingDir/butterfly/outdoor_airflow/" and it says no such file or directory.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/qqgeSDS7OBde4HkoJr5E4FIU-01D7UFi9mOYWtM0fSRLPKN8Ot1yXXd4hvVAP7cFf8ezM3cnsRarE13eRgK64aukhIx-70A2/1.JPG)

Create case component shows that folder is created in the right location. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2Rc6Wxf40xaBSoIdSXsBiuotkkL72FhawDfEdhxWk1wu8Rqb0K8QzP6OVhO531af4wzvxxkccPRRTZb8EM3MRMG903fGuKNe/2.JPG)
This means the VM and butterfly are looking into two different folders. Did you install VM and OpenFOAM both as an admin?

In my case, I have only one user account system, so I installed both the OpenFoam and VM just by double clicking on the setup file.

One thing I want to make sure is that, by installing as an admin do you mean that even while installation I need to run my setup file as an admin?
